General.Name: D.T.C. Industries Public Company Limited
General.Description: D.T.C. Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes pens and related products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers ball point and chemical pens, pencil, stamp and ink, binder clip, and stapler and staples. It also engages in space rental business. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Phra Khanong, Thailand.
